title: [Accepted] Microsoft | L63 | Noida/Hyderabad/Bangalore
content:
Education: B. Tech. in CS from TIER 2 college
Years of Experience: 7+
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at Amazon
Previous salary: Approx 78lpa (48L base+30L annual RSU at current price).
Date of the Offer: Last week of April 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L63
Location: Team is colocated in 3 cities, all 3 options(Noida/Hyderabad/Bangalore) are given, I am inclined to join Noida location.
Salary: 53,00,000
Signing Bonus: 7(year 1) + 5(year 2)
Stock bonus: 200K USD, 4 year vesting
Variable Bonus: 0 to 30% of base, average = 15%
Relocation: 8L (1+3 people relocation lumpsum).
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 1.15 cr
Benefits: Standard Microsoft India benefits

Went through 3 rounds of negotiations.

title: MPL vs Tekion Offer
content:
Company : Tekion
Title: SE-2
Location: Bangalore
Base: 27
Joining Bonus: 2L
Stock Options: 6000 units (Esops)

Company :MPL
Title: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore
Base: 26L
Joining Bonus: 1L
Stocks: NA

YOE: 4
Please help in deciding which one to join.

title: ZScaler | Intern + FTE Offer | 2024
content:
* **Education** : B.Tech from Tier 3 college
* **Company Visit** :  Oncampus
* **Years of Experience**: 0 years 
* **Company**: ZScaler
* **Title**: Developer C/C++ , Java Developer, API Developer 
* **Level**: Internship+FTE 
* **Location**: 	Bangalore/ Mohali/ Pune
* **Stipend** : 50K per month
* Base **Salary**: INR 14,00,000 Bonus: INR 2,00,000 Stock bonus: 15K USD RSU's Total: ~ INR 26,50,000 
* **Bond**: No 
* **Mode**: Online  

* Selection process Pre-Placement Talk-> Hacker Rank Test-> 2-3 Technical Interview Rounds-> HR round
role: Developer C/c++ , Java Developer, Api Developer
